tool_description: Get workout exercises for every muscle group. This API provides a variety of exercises tailored to specific muscle groups and difficulty levels.

api_list.name: /v1/exercises
api_list.description: API Ninjas Exercises API endpoint. Returns up to 10 exercises that satisfy the given parameters.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Number of results to offset for pagination. Default is 0.

optional_parameters.name: muscle
optional_parameters.description: Muscle group targeted by the exercise. Possible values include: abdominals, abductors, adductors, biceps, calves, chest, forearms, glutes, hamstrings, lats, lower_back, middle_back, neck, quadriceps, traps, triceps.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Exercise type. Possible values include: cardio, olympic_weightlifting, plyometrics, powerlifting, strength, stretching, strongman.

optional_parameters.name: difficulty
optional_parameters.description: Difficulty level of the exercise. Possible values include: beginner, intermediate, expert.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Name of the exercise. This value can be partial (e.g., 'press' will match 'Dumbbell Bench Press').
